sn55.43:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.43:1.4: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.43:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
sn55.43:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā.
sn55.43:4.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaraṁ puññassa pamāṇaṁ gaṇetuṁ:
sn55.43:4.3: Atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchatī”ti.
